TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IGridProvider

summary.span: 公開方法與屬性，以支援控制項的使用者介面自動化用戶端存取，這些控制項的作用如同子項目集合的容器。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements.

summary.span: 此項目的子系必須實作 ，並組織成可使用鍵盤周遊的二維邏輯座標系統 (也就是使用者介面自動化用戶端可以移至相鄰的控制項)。

span.span: The children of this element must implement and be organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed (that is, a UI Automation client can move to adjacent controls) by using the keyboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作控制項模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern. 不會啟用方格的使用中操作，而必須實作 才能啟用此功能。 does not enable active manipulation of a grid; must be implemented to enable this functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnCount As Integer
public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得方格中的資料行總數。

span.span: Gets the total number of columns in a grid.
The total number of columns in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隱藏資料列和資料行，根據提供者實作方式，可以在載入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀結構，因此會反映在和屬性。Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, can be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. 如果隱藏資料列和資料行尚未載入，則不會列入計數。If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼傳回的屬性值。The following example code returns the property value. [!code-csharp[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/CSharp/CustomGrid.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/visualbasic/customgrid.vb#102)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple GetItem(int32 row, int32 column) cil managed
Public Function GetItem (row As Integer, column As Integer) As IRawElementProviderSimple

span.span: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
The ordinal number of the column of interest.

summary.span: 擷取指定儲存格的使用者介面自動化提供者。

span.span: Retrieves the UI Automation provider for the specified cell.

returns.span: 指定儲存格的使用者介面自動化提供者。

span.span: The UI Automation provider for the specified cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 方格座標是以零為起始座標為 (0，0) 的左上角 （或為右上儲存格的地區設定）。Grid coordinates are zero-based with the upper left (or upper right cell depending on locale) having coordinates (0,0). - 如果是空的資料格的 UI 自動化提供者仍必須傳回以支援為該資料格屬性。If a cell is empty a UI Automation provider must still be returned in order to support the property for that cell. 在方格中的子元素的版面配置類似不完全陣列時，這是可行的。This is possible when the layout of child elements in the grid is similar to a ragged array. ![Windows 檔案總管 檢視顯示不完全的配置。](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows 檔案總管 檢視顯示不完全的配置。")![Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.") 座標是空的方格控制項範例Example of a Grid Control with Empty Coordinates - 隱藏資料列和資料行，根據提供者實作方式，可以在載入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀結構，因此會反映在和屬性。Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, can be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. 如果隱藏資料列和資料行尚未載入，則不應納入考量。If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they should not be counted. ## Examples 下列程式碼是範例實作這個方法會傳回物件，代表位於指定位置的項目。The following code is an example implementation of this method that returns an object representing the item at the specified location. [!code-csharp[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/CSharp/CustomGrid.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/visualbasic/customgrid.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowCount As Integer
public: property int RowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得方格的資料列總數。

span.span: Gets the total number of rows in a grid.
The total number of rows in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隱藏資料列和資料行，根據提供者實作方式，可以在邏輯樹狀結構載入，因此會反映在和屬性。Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, can be loaded in the logical tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. 如果隱藏資料列和資料行尚未載入，則不會列入計數。If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼傳回的屬性值。The following example code returns the property value. [!code-csharp[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/CSharp/CustomGrid.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMiscPatternProviders_snip/visualbasic/customgrid.vb#103)]
